name: Candy Ball Free
description:
100 candy is best and addictive ball play game you ever seen and 100% FREE GAME. In this game you have several bowls according to candies in your jar.These bowl will transit form one side to another and your task is to collect 100 candy coins in theses bowls.100 Candy is simplest game ever.
If you collected candies with same colored bowl then you will get maximum points.100 candy is basically strategic ,that enhance your grabbing power.
We categories point distribution as
1 Gray ball=1 pt
1 Green=2 pt
1 Red=3 3pt
1 Cyan=4 pt
Key Features of Game are :-

1.FREE Premium game for all
2.Get 100 Balls on launch of game
2.Attractive High resolution graphics
3.Beautiful shining candies
4.Many candies with respective bowls
5.Addictive games for all age range
6.Enhance creativity of mind
7.Easy time pass with smooth UI
